about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: House Team Consultants
about.p1: We are an experienced team of Real Estate Consultants from RE/MAX, belonging to Expogroup, founded under the concept of Entrepreneur Broker.
about.p2: We are fully available to assist you at every stage of your project, whether buying, selling, or renting your future property. Our mission is to offer personalized, high-quality service.

tools.gains.title: Capital Gains Calculator
tools.gains.subtitle: Simulate the IRS tax payable on real estate.
tools.gains.question_self_built: Was the house built by yourself?
tools.gains.note_coefficients: *Affects the date considered for coefficient purposes.
tools.gains.question_expenses: Did you have expenses (works, IMT, Stamp Duty, others)?
tools.gains.note_works: *Only works carried out in the last 12 years.
tools.gains.question_state_sale: Was the sale of this residential property made to the State, Autonomous Regions, or local authorities?
tools.gains.note_state_exempt: By selecting 'Yes', the capital gain will be exempt from taxation (IRS).
tools.gains.question_hpp: Was the property your Main Residence (HPP) for at least 12 months?
tools.gains.option_hpp_less12: No, it was for less than 12 months
tools.gains.question_reinvest_new: Do you intend to reinvest the money in another Main Residence?
tools.gains.question_amortize: Do you intend to amortize a mortgage loan (HPP) with the sale value?
tools.gains.note_amortize: *Valid for sales of secondary properties/land in 2023/2024 (More Housing Law).
tools.gains.question_retired: Are you retired or over 65 years old?
tools.gains.note_retired: *Allows exemption if reinvested in PPR or Life Insurance.
tools.gains.question_joint_tax: Do you file a joint tax return?
tools.gains.label_annual_income: What is your Annual Taxable Income for IRS? (€)
tools.gains.note_income: *Value from Annex A of your IRS declaration.
tools.gains.question_support: Did you receive non-refundable support (>30% VPT) for the alienated property?
tools.gains.placeholder_results: Fill in the form and click 'Simulate' to see detailed results.
tools.gains.note_exemption_calc: The exemption is calculated proportionally to the reinvested amount versus the sale value.
tools.gains.legal_note_text: Gains from the sale of residential properties to the State or local authorities are fully exempt from taxation. If you reinvested, the tax is reduced proportionally.
tools.gains.modal_desc: To view the full result and receive the official PDF report, please provide your contact details.
tools.gains.alert_fill_values: Please fill in at least the acquisition and sale values.
tools.gains.alert_fill_contact: Please fill in your name and email to continue.
tools.gains.alert_error_check: Check if you filled in all required fields correctly.

tools.imt.tooltip_eligible: Up to 35 years old and 1st main residence. **Only applies if purpose is HPP.**
tools.imt.breakdown_marginal_note: Youth IMT: 8% applied on surplus over
tools.imt.breakdown_formula: Calculation: (Acquisition Value x Marginal Rate) - Abatement Amount.

legal.cookies_li4: Ensure the proper functioning of the website

legal.privacy_intro: This Privacy Policy governs the processing of personal data collected through the website :url, responsibility of :company, headquartered at R. Cidade de Bissau, 1800-240 Lisbon — Portugal, hereinafter referred to as “House Team”.
legal.privacy_intro_2: House Team is committed to processing personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR – Regulation (EU) 2016/679) and other applicable legislation in Portugal.
legal.privacy_p1_intro: The following data may be collected:
legal.privacy_li1_4: Information provided voluntarily through contact forms
legal.privacy_li1_5: Technical navigation data (IP address, cookies, device type, and browser)
legal.privacy_li2_1: Respond to contact or information requests
legal.privacy_li2_2: Provide services and communications within the scope of House Team's activity
legal.privacy_p4: Personal data will be kept only for the period necessary for the purposes that motivated their collection or for the legally required time.
legal.privacy_p5: Personal data is not sold or ceded to third parties, unless required by law or necessary for compliance with legal obligations.
legal.privacy_p6_intro: The data subject has the right to:
legal.privacy_li6_5: Lodge a complaint with the CNPD – National Data Protection Commission
legal.privacy_p7: Appropriate technical and organizational measures are adopted to protect personal data against unauthorized access, loss, or improper disclosure.
legal.privacy_p8: This Privacy Policy may be updated at any time, with changes published on the website.
